Package waitersProgram.controller

Class WaitersControlPanelController

java.lang.Object
waitersProgram.controller.WaitersControlPanelController
public class WaitersControlPanelController extends Object
The WaitersController class. It will be used to control the waiter's graphical interface (both WaitersControlPanel and WaitersOrderUpdateFrame) and it will contain a ListeningPost instance in order to ensure the communication with the Restaurant class (backend's facade controller). This class and its GUI will be running on the same device of ListeningPost class (server), so it's not necessary to establish a socket communication (in ChefsController that was mandatory).
